title: President urges citizens to refrain from violence as they protest
body_lines: President Gotabaya Rajapaksa today urged all citizens to refrain from violence as they protest and assured an impartial and transparent inquiry into the Rambukkana violence.

Rajapaksa, in a statement on his Twitter said Sri Lankan citizens' right to peacefully protest will not be hindered and the Police will carry out an impartial and transparent inquiry into the Rambukkana incident which led to tragedy for which he was "deeply saddened".
"I urge all citizens to refrain from violence as they protest," he said.
